articles.description: Ontario’s attorney general is proposing to get rid of fixed election dates in the province, in a bill that would also see the limit for political donations raised to $5,000 and make public funding for political parties permanent.

articles.description: A new Food Banks Canada report says monthly visits to food banks came close to 2.2 million in March 2025, nearly double the rate in 2019.

articles.title: Canada not on track to meet 2030 climate targets, report finds
articles.description: A new analysis says Canada is not on track to meet its 2030 or 2035 emissions targets.
